## Install or Update:``` bashpip install -U pyrubi```
## Example:``` pythonfrom pyrubi import Botbot = Bot("sessionName")for update in bot.on_message(): if update.text() == 'hello': bot.send_text(update.chat_id(), f"**Hello** ``{update.author_title()}``. __This message is from the Pyrubi library.__", update.message_id())```
## Features: - **Fast** : *The requests are very fast.*- **Easy** : *All methods and features are designed as easy and optimal as possible*- **Powerful** : *While the library is simple, it has high speed and features that make your work easier and faster*
